item.title: CROWN CRAFTS INC 10-K
item.description: CROWN CRAFTS INC, which is in the Broadwoven Fabric Mills, Cotton [2211] industry, SEC 10-K filing on June 09, 2021 had 18560 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 673 instances 2021 - 226 instances march - 206 instances tax - 194 instances income - 169 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
